about.presentation1: I am a Web Developer, I am looking for a job after spending one year of intership into a company specialized in cybersecurity. This experience allows me to have a great autonomy and be more confident about my new skills.
about.presentation2: I have literary background, I started with English Studies. However, my educational journey took another turn to the IT world. Indeed, I've always been very interesting into IT development, I first started this new career into this world by learning by myself thanks to onlines courses and videos. After that, I started a school training to become a web developer with OpenClassrooms which helped to reinforce and develop my new skills.

skills.integration: Integration of responsive websites and mobiles applications that meet W3C standards
